column2: "Yes, I got the report. Your application for the unrestricted exploration permit won't be delayed. I expect great things from you."
"...and well, the regulated report ended like that. So, now listen to what I have to say."
"According to ARKS, as the Seabed exploration has just begun not long ago, a high level of risk is expected."
"So by granting you this permission, please think carefully and find the missions that you attempt by yourself."
"We look forward to your actions and set a good example for the juniors to follow."
